name: Saving Mars
description:
This is my 2D Platformer called Saving Mars 

Modifications:

1.Revamped the Main Menu and The Menu 

2.Added 4 new levels that are fun and challenging

3.Added a boss fight in the final level

4. In the fifth level I re designed the tile map to fit Mars's theme

5. Added a little bit of storyline by adding a text pop up before starting the game

Created by Hamza Almawla

Credit for the main menu background (http://fantasyartdesign.com/free-wallpapers/digital-art.php?u_i=667&i_i=861)
